component.name: Sonori
component.summary: Local AI-powered speech transcription for Linux

description.p: Sonori is a lightweight, transparent overlay application for local AI-powered speech transcription on Linux. All processing happens on your device with no cloud services required, ensuring complete privacy. Perfect for accessibility, note-taking, or live captioning.

ul.li: Local AI Processing: All transcription happens on your device - no cloud services required
Multi-Backend Support: Choose between CTranslate2, Whisper.cpp, and other local AI backends
Dual Transcription Modes: Real-time continuous transcription or manual on-demand sessions
GPU Acceleration: Accelerate transcription using Vulkan (Whisper.cpp backend)
Voice Activity Detection: Uses Silero VAD for accurate speech detection
Transparent Overlay: Non-intrusive overlay at the bottom of your screen
Audio Visualization: Visual feedback with spectrogram display
Wayland and X11 Support: Works with modern Linux desktop environments
CLI Mode: Run without GUI for headless usage
Global Shortcuts: System-wide hotkeys via XDG Desktop Portal
System Tray Integration: Quick access with window control

custom.value: No data is collected or transmitted. All processing happens locally.
